description: a simple document to backup a HANA database using HDBSQL using Backint, with one tenant database.

BackupType.description: Backup type, either full, differential, incremental.

SystemID.description: SAP HANA system ID, for example HDB

TenantSID.description: SAP HANA Tenant database system ID, may be the same as SID

runCommand: sudo -u hdbadm -i hdbsql -U SYSTEM "BACKUP DATA $BTYPE USING BACKINT ('/usr/sap/{{SystemID}}/SYS/global/hdb/backint/SYSTEMDB/SystemDB_{{BackupType}}_backup')"
sudo -u hdbadm -i hdbsql -U SYSTEM "BACKUP DATA $BTYPE FOR {{TenantSID}} USING BACKINT ('/usr/sap/{{SystemID}}/SYS/global/hdb/backint/DB_{{TenantSID}}/{{TenantSID}}_{{BackupType}}_backup')"
